headline: Apple Inc (AAPL) Increases its Total Investment to $600 billion to Expand its Manufacturing in the United States
summary: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the Good Stocks to Invest in Now. On August 8, Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) announced a new major $100 billion investment in the United States, bringing its total investment commitment to $600 billion over the next four years. This investment is meant to expand the company’s supply chain and advanced […]
